Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a home run to start off the scoring in the 2nd inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets have a 2-1 record in this series and now they have complete control.
The Phillies have lost four of their last five games as road favorites against National League opponents.
The Mets have won seven of their last eight games at Citi Field.
The Mets have covered the run line in seven of their last eight games at Citi Field against teams that held a winning record.
The Phillies have failed to cover the run line in seven of their last eight games at Citi Field against National League opponents that held a winning record.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets are going to have no issue getting the job done here.
Ranger Suarez gave up six runs in his last start and is going to struggle here.
Others: Shane Mickle predicts the Mets to win the game on the money line.
